00027  *
00028  * Network Request Scheduler (NRS) Token Bucket Filter(TBF) policy
00029  *
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef _LUSTRE_NRS_TBF_H
00033 #define _LUSTRE_NRS_TBF_H
00034 
00035 /* \name tbf
00036  *
00037  * TBF policy
00038  *
00039  * @{
00040  */
00041 
00042 struct nrs_tbf_head;
00043 struct nrs_tbf_cmd;
00044 
00045 struct nrs_tbf_jobid {
00046         char            *tj_id;
00047         struct list_head tj_linkage;
00048 };
00049 
00050 struct nrs_tbf_client {
00052         struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource       tc_res;
00054         struct hlist_node                tc_hnode;
00056         lnet_nid_t                       tc_nid;
00058         char                             tc_jobid[LUSTRE_JOBID_SIZE];
00060         atomic_t                         tc_ref;
00062         spinlock_t                       tc_rule_lock;
00064         struct list_head                 tc_linkage;
00066         struct nrs_tbf_rule             *tc_rule;
00068         __u64                            tc_rule_generation;
00070         __u64                            tc_rpc_rate;
00072         __u64                            tc_nsecs;
00074         __u64                            tc_ntoken;
00076         __u64                            tc_depth;
00078         __u64                            tc_check_time;
00080         struct list_head                 tc_list;
00082         struct cfs_binheap_node          tc_node;
00084         bool                             tc_in_heap;
00086         __u32                            tc_rule_sequence;
00091         struct list_head                 tc_lru;
00092 };
00093 
00094 #define MAX_TBF_NAME (16)
00095 
00096 #define NTRS_STOPPING   0x0000001
00097 #define NTRS_DEFAULT    0x0000002
00098 
00099 struct nrs_tbf_rule {
00101         char                             tr_name[MAX_TBF_NAME];
00103         struct nrs_tbf_head             *tr_head;
00105         struct list_head                 tr_linkage;
00107         struct list_head                 tr_nids;
00109         char                            *tr_nids_str;
00111         struct list_head                 tr_jobids;
00113         char                            *tr_jobids_str;
00115         __u64                            tr_rpc_rate;
00117         __u64                            tr_nsecs;
00119         __u64                            tr_depth;
00121         spinlock_t                       tr_rule_lock;
00123         struct list_head                 tr_cli_list;
00125         __u32                            tr_flags;
00127         atomic_t                         tr_ref;
00129         __u64                            tr_generation;
00130 };
00131 
00132 struct nrs_tbf_ops {
00133         char *o_name;
00134         int (*o_startup)(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *, struct nrs_tbf_head *);
00135         struct nrs_tbf_client *(*o_cli_find)(struct nrs_tbf_head *,
00136                                              struct ptlrpc_request *);
00137         struct nrs_tbf_client *(*o_cli_findadd)(struct nrs_tbf_head *,
00138                                                 struct nrs_tbf_client *);
00139         void (*o_cli_put)(struct nrs_tbf_head *, struct nrs_tbf_client *);
00140         void (*o_cli_init)(struct nrs_tbf_client *, struct ptlrpc_request *);
00141         int (*o_rule_init)(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *,
00142                            struct nrs_tbf_rule *,
00143                            struct nrs_tbf_cmd *);
00144         int (*o_rule_dump)(struct nrs_tbf_rule *, struct seq_file *);
00145         int (*o_rule_match)(struct nrs_tbf_rule *,
00146                             struct nrs_tbf_client *);
00147         void (*o_rule_fini)(struct nrs_tbf_rule *);
00148 };
00149 
00150 #define NRS_TBF_TYPE_JOBID      "jobid"
00151 #define NRS_TBF_TYPE_NID        "nid"
00152 #define NRS_TBF_TYPE_MAX_LEN    20
00153 #define NRS_TBF_FLAG_JOBID      0x0000001
00154 #define NRS_TBF_FLAG_NID        0x0000002
00155 
00156 struct nrs_tbf_bucket {
00161         struct list_head        ntb_lru;
00162 };
00163 
00167 struct nrs_tbf_head {
00171         struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource       th_res;
00175         struct list_head                 th_list;
00179         spinlock_t                       th_rule_lock;
00183         atomic_t                         th_rule_sequence;
00187         struct nrs_tbf_rule             *th_rule;
00191         struct hrtimer                   th_timer;
00195         __u64                            th_deadline;
00199         __u64                            th_sequence;
00203         struct cfs_binheap              *th_binheap;
00207         struct cfs_hash                 *th_cli_hash;
00211         char                             th_type[NRS_TBF_TYPE_MAX_LEN + 1];
00215         struct nrs_tbf_ops              *th_ops;
00219         __u32                            th_type_flag;
00223         int                              th_purge_start;
00224 };

00226 enum nrs_tbf_cmd_type {
00227         NRS_CTL_TBF_START_RULE = 0,
00228         NRS_CTL_TBF_STOP_RULE,
00229         NRS_CTL_TBF_CHANGE_RATE,
00230 };
00231 
00232 struct nrs_tbf_cmd {
00233         enum nrs_tbf_cmd_type    tc_cmd;
00234         char                    *tc_name;
00235         __u64                    tc_rpc_rate;
00236         struct list_head         tc_nids;
00237         char                    *tc_nids_str;
00238         struct list_head         tc_jobids;
00239         char                    *tc_jobids_str;
00240         __u32                    tc_valid_types;
00241         __u32                    tc_rule_flags;
00242 };
00243 
00244 struct nrs_tbf_req {
00248         struct list_head        tr_list;
00252         __u64                   tr_sequence;
00253 };

00258 enum nrs_ctl_tbf {
00262         NRS_CTL_TBF_RD_RULE = PTLRPC_NRS_CTL_1ST_POL_SPEC,
00266         NRS_CTL_TBF_WR_RULE,
00267 };
